content: this pattern is for wings only for adding to another pattern i designed these wings for the pattern nilla the unicorn 1 by rachel borello carroll but you could use these wings for another pattern that has similar proportions i recommend using the same yarn/needle weight as the rest of your project i made my wings using my cc for the nilla the unicorn pattern > **note ** this is a write-up of something i previously knit and has not been tested if anything isn t working right please let me know 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/nilla-the-unicorn
